<template>
    <node-view-wrapper class="radio-select border-r-2 border-r-gray-500">
        <input type='radio' v-bind:name="na" />(+)
        <input type='radio' v-bind:name="na" />(-)
    </node-view-wrapper>
</template>

<script>
import { nodeViewProps, NodeViewWrapper } from '@tiptap/vue-2'

export default {
    components: {
        NodeViewWrapper,
    },

    data() {
        return {
            na: this.node.attrs.na,
        }
    },

    props: nodeViewProps,
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.radio-select {
    display: inline;
    margin-right: 0.5em;
}

input[type="radio"] {
    margin-right: 0.5em
}
</style>
